text:
The topical coverage corresponds with the following CFA Institute assigned reading:
32. Financial Reporting Quality
The candidate should be able to:
a. distinguish between financial reporting quality and quality of reported results
(including quality of earnings, cash flow, and balance sheet items). (page 304)
b. describe a spectrum for assessing financial reporting quality. (page 305)
c. distinguish between conservative and aggressive accounting. (page 306)
